name: InTechnology
tag_list: data-backup, network, ip-telephony, hosted-voip, colocation, managed-hosting, unifed-communications, hosted-ocs, hosted-exchange, business-continuity, disaster-recovery, remote-worker, push-to-talk
overview:
Established in 1983, InTechnology is in a unique position in the Managed IT Services market place, having a portfolio of value added, hosted voice and data services that are integrated and delivered over our own end-to-end quality assured IP network.

InTechnology have been serving the UK IT market for over 25 years. We have a deep understanding of the issues businesses face regarding data security management, network performance and resilience. In this ever changing world where keeping abreast of technology is a challenge, InTechnology can provide you with proven solutions to real problems.

Our position in the UK Managed IT Services market is unique. We currently manage over 14,000 network circuits, host 16,000 IP telephony users, secure over 5,000 TB of customer data in our four world class, 50,000Â² ft capacity data centres. A fifth data centre is due to be commissioned in 2010 and we have also invested Â£1m in industry leading monitoring tools and systems, and have upgraded our Harrogate data centre as part of a Â£3m refit project.

We are the outsourcing provider of choice for over 800 customers, including a number of central government departments, major international law firms, national insurance, property and professional services companies or higher education institutions.
